attributes.action: stop holiday companies from increasing prices during school holidays and discriminating against families
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Prices of holidays during the school holidays increases dramatically, discriminating against families.  This is a petition to prevent holiday companies increasing their prices during these times.  
Schools are currently stopping children being taken out of school for holidays during term time.  Most parents only take children out of school during the term because they cannot afford holidays at any other time.  
If we took away the initial problem of the price increase, it would benefit:
1)schools - resulting in higher attendance 
2)parents - fairer, affordable prices and less chance of prosecution for unauthorised absence.
